actionCalls.description: Send an email to the student regarding their mid point evaluation based on values selected by the evaluator.

value.stringValue: Mid Point Evaluation from Excelsior University

decisions.name: If_the_person_running_the_flow_is_Primary_Faculty
decisions.label: If the person running the flow is Primary Faculty

Flow.description: Flow that guides faculty through the student mid-term evaluations. If any field needs intervention, a separate flag is created for the best academic advisor on the student's contact record.

formulas.description: additional comments added for assignment rating
formulas.name: Additional_Comments_Assignments_Select_EmailTemplate

formulas.description: Determines what goes in email template for student for attendance rating
formulas.name: Additional_Comments_Attendance_Participation_EmailTemplate

formulas.description: Determines what goes in the student email regarding discussion rating.
formulas.name: Additional_Comments_Discussion_Select_EmailTemplate

formulas.description: Determines what goes in the student email regarding assignment performance.
formulas.name: Assignments_Select_EmailTemplate

formulas.description: Determines what goes in the email template for Attendance value.
formulas.name: Attendance_Participation_Select_EmailTemplate

formulas.description: Students rating as noted in the email to student
formulas.name: Discussion_Select_EmailTemplate

formulas.description: Determines what resources will be in the students email based on choices selected by evaluator.
formulas.name: ResourcesSelected_EmailTemplate
formulas.expression:
IF( AND( {!Accessibility_Services_Resource} = false, {!Bookstore_Resource} = false, {!CareerDevelopment_Resource} = false, {!Brainfusetutoring_Resource} = false, {!ComPsych_Resource} = false, {!Library_Resource} = false, {!OWL_Resource} = false ), "No recommendations at this time", IF({!Accessibility_Services_Resource}, "Accessibility Services - For students who demonstrate a need for reasonable accommodations per ADA regulations. Contact ACS@excelsior.edu or 844-427-4356" & "
", "") & IF({!Bookstore_Resource}, "Bookstore - Contact information for the bookstore through https://www.excelsior.edu/support-resources/bookstore-and-more/" & "
", "") & IF({!CareerDevelopment_Resource}, "Career Development - Offers Career Exploration and planning services. Contact at careerinfo@excelsior.edu or 888-533-9267" & "
", "") & IF({!Brainfusetutoring_Resource}, "Brainfuse (tutoring) - Work with a tutor online in real-time or submit questions and/or essays and coursework. You can also pre-schedule an online appointment. Choose from a wide variety of subjects. *available within Excelsior University courses" & "
", "") & IF({!ComPsych_Resource}, "ComPsych - Find 24/7 support and assistance from licensed clinicians and other professionals for issues that arise. This program offers confidential support and self-service resources at no additional cost. A link to these resources can be accessed within your MyExcelsior student portal" & "
", "") & IF({!Library_Resource}, "Library - Access online resources, including research databases, and contact librarians for customized help. https://library.excelsior.edu/home" & "
", "") & IF({!OWL_Resource}, "OWL - The Excelsior Online Writing Lab (OWL) is a free public writing resource offering comprehensive support for college-level writing and reading, including grammar guidance through the use of rich, multimedia technology. https://owl.excelsior.edu/" & "
", "") )

Flow.label: Mid Point Evaluation Screen Flow

recordLookups.description: Get the email of the owner and the student of the new flag to be used to send an email notification.
recordLookups.name: Get_Advisor_Email
recordLookups.label: Get Advisor Email

fields.name: Copy_4_of_FaultMessage
fields.fieldText:
Hmm, we have encountered an error in trying to create this flag. Please share the below message with the Salesforce Administrator to aid in troubleshooting.


If the error message contains "NUMBER_OUTSIDE_VALID_RANGE", please check the Current Average field and confirm an invalid number (greater than 100) has been entered.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Thankyou
fields.fieldText: You have Completed all Mid Point Evaluations for this offering.

fields.name: Error
fields.fieldText: Sorry, You can't complete the mid-point feedback as you are not listed as the primary faculty

fields.name: Current_Average
fields.helpText: Please input the student's current estimated grade

fields.name: FlagNotice
fields.fieldText: Your Current Selection will create a flag for the advisor for this student

fields.name: Recommendation
fields.fieldText: Provide a recommendation for how the student can improve

fields.fieldText: Provide a recommendation for how the student can improve

validationRule.errorMessage: Enter Less than 250 Characters

fields.name: Recommendation2
fields.fieldText: Provide a recommendation for how the student can improve

validationRule.errorMessage: Enter Less than 250 Characters

fields.name: DT01
fields.fieldText: Click Next to Start your Mid-Point Feedback for this course offering.

textTemplates.name: EmailBody4Advisor
textTemplates.text: An intervention flag has been raised for student {!Get_Advisor_Email.Faculty_Member__r.FirstName} {!Get_Advisor_Email.Faculty_Member__r.LastName} for course offering {!Get_Course_Offering.Name}. Please view your open flags list view to access the flag.

textTemplates.description: Send a confirmation email to the faculty that the flag was opened.
textTemplates.name: emailBody4Faculty
textTemplates.text:
This email is confirmation that you have created an intervention flag for student {!Get_Advisor_Email.Faculty_Member__r.FirstName} {!Get_Advisor_Email.Faculty_Member__r.LastName} for course offering {!Get_Course_Offering.Name}.
Thank You, Excelsior University

textTemplates.description: Body of the email that goes to the student.
textTemplates.name: StudentEmailTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!StudentSelectionDataTable.firstSelectedRow.Name__c},

As we navigate the midpoint of our journey in {!Get_Course_Offering.hed__Course__r.Name}, I want to share some insights on your performance thus far.

Current Estimated Grade: {!Current_Average}

Attendance and Participation:

For attendance and participation, your performance has been {!Attendance_Participation_Select_EmailTemplate}

{!Additional_Comments_Attendance_Participation_EmailTemplate}

Assignments:

For assignments, your performance has been {!Assignments_Select_EmailTemplate}

{!Additional_Comments_Assignments_Select_EmailTemplate}

Discussions:

For discussions, your performance has been {!Discussion_Select_EmailTemplate}

{!Additional_Comments_Discussion_Select_EmailTemplate}

Resources:

Resources that may help you improve your course performance:

{!ResourcesSelected_EmailTemplate}


I’m committed to assisting you in optimizing your performance and achieving your academic goals. Please contact me via Canvas Inbox if you have any questions or would like to discuss this mid-course feedback.

Thank you for your ongoing dedication to your studies.

Warm regards,

{!Get_Course_Offering.Qualified_Faculty__r.Faculty_Name__c}
